sentences.en: After that my skateboard was one of the fastest in the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 我的朋友帮我安装了一些新的电脑软件,那电脑一下子快了不少.

sentences.en: At first I couldn't control the skateboard as well as a maneuver.
sentences.cn: 起初我对滑板并不能做到得心应手.

sentences.en: Don't skateboard or roller skate on the road..
sentences.cn: 不要在路上玩滑板或溜冰.

sentences.en: Elbow pads and knee pads are essential on a skateboard.
sentences.cn: 滑滑板时带护肘和护膝是必要的.

sentences.en: Example : The boy traded his skateboard for a cricket bat.
sentences.cn: 这男孩用滑板换了一板球棒.

sentences.en: He has long hair.He has a black skateboard.Who is he?
sentences.cn: 他有长头发.他有一黑色溜冰板.他是谁？

sentences.en: He takes me for rides on his skateboard.
sentences.cn: 他玩滑板的时候也让我坐上去。

sentences.en: In Miami, Florida, it is illegal skateboard in a police station.
sentences.cn: 佛罗里达州的迈阿密规定, 在警察局玩溜滑板是非法的.

sentences.en: Kitty has a scarf and a skateboard.
sentences.cn: 基蒂有个围巾和溜冰板。

sentences.en: Number 4, Because I couldn't get a camel a skateboard.
sentences.cn: 第4, 因为我不能得到站在滑雪板上的骆驼.

sentences.en: One time I had a skateboard, but it wasn't very fast.
sentences.cn: 滑板也能改装, 让它加快速度呀?你可要注意安全啊.

sentences.en: Please check your skateboard's states. You need to pay for any damage.
sentences.cn: 请您检查您的雪板是否有损坏. 如果有损坏. 需要赔偿的!

sentences.en: Scooter, Finger Scooter, Finger Skateboard, Roller Skate, Snow Board. Toy and Games.
sentences.cn: 采购产品摩托车, 手指摩托车, 手指滑板, 滚筒溜冰鞋, 雪搭乘. 玩具和游戏.

sentences.en: These are my skateboard graphic designs, there is more coming soon.
sentences.cn: 之前画的一些, 马上又出新的图案了.

sentences.en: They can go to skateboard parks, to swimming pools or to video arcades.
sentences.cn: 他们可去滑板场 、 游泳池或去游乐中心玩电子游戏机.

sentences.en: Those two kids skateboard in the park to show some special technics.
sentences.cn: 那两个小孩在公园里滑板来展现一些特别的技巧.

sentences.en: When was the last time you were even on a skateboard?
sentences.cn: 你最后一次站在滑板上是什么时候?

sentences.en: Whose new skateboard is this? This is his new skateboard.
sentences.cn: 这是谁的新滑板? 这是他的新滑板.

words.tran_cn: 滑溜冰板的人；滑板运动员

trans.tran_en: a short board with two small wheels at each end, which you can stand on and ride for fun or as a sport
